--------------------------- ----------------------------

Deep in the highest and most remote mountain range are the home and hiding place
for the legendary Silver Stallion. The ranchers tell stories about the
Silver Ghost Horse, that has led them on wild chases, half seen but never captured.

For one man (Russell Crowe), the desire to capture the Silver Stallion has become
an obsession, and he will stop at nothing to tame the wild beast. Told through the
words of a mother as she writes page-by-page entertainment for her horse-crazy daughter.

Enjoy the movie!
